title: Number of Fatal Injuries at the Pula Steel Factory
summary: The graph details the Number of Fatal Injuries per Year , at the Fatal Injuries Pula Steel Factory .
Covering the years 2012 - 2016 the graph shows that the highest Number of fatalities occurred in 2013 , with 32 fatalities .
The lowest Number of fatalities occurred in 2015 , with 22 fatalities that Year .
gold: We can see from the chart the fatal injuries sustained at the Pula Steel Factory between 2012 and 2016 . The number of fatalities grew from 27 in 2012 to 32 in 2013 . Thereafter , there has been a decline over the years down to 22 in 2015 .
